title: Big Data-Driven Emergency Language Education Design: Customized Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Communication Skills and Expertise in Social Domain Relevant to Job Roles
context.additional_context: Evening/weekend operations for working professionals, enabling real-time data collection and analysis in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners improve target language proficiency by 30% using personalized language vulnerability reports generated through big data analysis.
Resolution of ≥80% of urgent language situations required in work environments (meetings, negotiations, report writing, etc.) through project-based tasks.
Utilize a customized learning path system to establish and achieve self-directed learning plans at a rate of over 90%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
